title: I'm Leny, 37, full-stack webdeveloper.
description: Currently working as _Lead Webdeveloper & Sysadmin_ at [Mango3D](https://mango3d.io) (in Belgium), taking part in the 3D printing revolution.
Passionate about solving problems and [sharing code](https://github.com/leny) with the community.
